verses.verse: Then <S%H6030>answered<s%> <S%H6691>Zophar<s%> the <S%H5284>Naamathite,<s%> and <S%H559>said,<s%>
<S%H3651>Therefore<s%> do my <S%H5587>thoughts<s%> cause me to <S%H7725>answer,<s%> and for this I make <S%H2363>haste.<s%>
I have <S%H8085>heard<s%> the <S%H4148>check<s%> of my <S%H3639>reproach,<s%> and the <S%H7307>spirit<s%> of my <S%H998>understanding<s%> causes me to <S%H6030>answer.<s%>
<S%H3045>Know<s%> you not <S%H2063>this<s%> of <S%H5703>old,<s%> <S%H4480>since<s%> <S%H120>man<s%> was <S%H7760>placed<s%> on <S%H776>earth,<s%>
That the <S%H7445>triumphing<s%> of the <S%H7563>wicked<s%> is <S%H7138>short,<s%> and the <S%H8057>joy<s%> of the <S%H2611>hypocrite<s%> but for a <S%H7281>moment?<s%>
Though his <S%H7863>excellency<s%> <S%H5927>mount<s%> up to the <S%H8064>heavens,<s%> and his <S%H7218>head<s%> <S%H5060>reach<s%> to the <S%H5645>clouds;<s%>
Yet he shall <S%H6>perish<s%> for <S%H5331>ever<s%> like his own <S%H1561>dung:<s%> they which have <S%H7200>seen<s%> him shall <S%H559>say,<s%> <S%H335>Where<s%> is he?
He shall <S%H5774>fly<s%> away as a <S%H2472>dream,<s%> and shall not be <S%H4672>found:<s%> yes, he shall be <S%H5074>chased<s%> away as a <S%H2384>vision<s%> of the <S%H3915>night.<s%>
The <S%H5869>eye<s%> also which <S%H7805>saw<s%> him shall see him <S%H3808>no<s%> <S%H3254>more;<s%> <S%H3808>neither<s%> shall his <S%H4725>place<s%> any <S%H5750>more<s%> <S%H7789>behold<s%> him.
His <S%H1121>children<s%> shall seek to <S%H7521>please<s%> the <S%H1800>poor,<s%> and his <S%H3027>hands<s%> shall <S%H7725>restore<s%> their <S%H202>goods.<s%>
His <S%H6106>bones<s%> are <S%H4390>full<s%> of the <S%H2403>sin<s%> of his <S%H5934>youth,<s%> which shall <S%H7901>lie<s%> <S%H7901>down<s%> with him in the <S%H6083>dust.<s%>
<S%H518>Though<s%> <S%H7451>wickedness<s%> be <S%H4985>sweet<s%> in his <S%H6310>mouth,<s%> though he <S%H3582>hide<s%> it <S%H8478>under<s%> his <S%H3956>tongue;<s%>
Though he <S%H2550>spare<s%> it, and <S%H5800>forsake<s%> it not; but <S%H4513>keep<s%> it still <S%H8432>within<s%> his <S%H2441>mouth:<s%>
Yet his <S%H3899>meat<s%> in his <S%H4578>bowels<s%> is <S%H2015>turned,<s%> it is the <S%H4846>gall<s%> of <S%H6620>asps<s%> <S%H7130>within<s%> him.
He has <S%H1104>swallowed<s%> down <S%H2428>riches,<s%> and he shall <S%H6958>vomit<s%> them up again: <S%H410>God<s%> shall <S%H3423>cast<s%> them out of his <S%H990>belly.<s%>
He shall <S%H3243>suck<s%> the <S%H7219>poison<s%> of <S%H6620>asps:<s%> the <S%H660>viper's<s%> <S%H3956>tongue<s%> shall <S%H2026>slay<s%> him.
He shall not <S%H7200>see<s%> the <S%H6390>rivers,<s%> the <S%H5104>floods,<s%> the <S%H5158>brooks<s%> of <S%H1706>honey<s%> and <S%H2529>butter.<s%>

That which he <S%H3022>labored<s%> for shall he <S%H7725>restore,<s%> and shall not <S%H1104>swallow<s%> it down: according to his <S%H2428>substance<s%> shall the <S%H8545>restitution<s%> be, and he shall not <S%H5965>rejoice<s%> therein.

<S%H3588>Because<s%> he has <S%H7533>oppressed<s%> and has <S%H5800>forsaken<s%> the <S%H1800>poor;<s%> because he has <S%H1497>violently<s%> <S%H1497>taken<s%> <S%H1497>away<s%> an <S%H1004>house<s%> which he <S%H1129>built<s%> not;
<S%H3588>Surely<s%> he shall not <S%H3045>feel<s%> <S%H7961>quietness<s%> in his <S%H990>belly,<s%> he shall not <S%H4422>save<s%> of that which he <S%H2530>desired.<s%>
There shall <S%H369>none<s%> of his <S%H400>meat<s%> be <S%H8300>left;<s%> <S%H5921>therefore<s%> <S%H3651><s%> shall <S%H3808>no<s%> man <S%H2342>look<s%> for his <S%H2898>goods.<s%>
In the <S%H4390>fullness<s%> of his <S%H5607>sufficiency<s%> he shall be in <S%H3334>straits:<s%> <S%H3605>every<s%> <S%H3027>hand<s%> of the <S%H6001>wicked<s%> shall <S%H935>come<s%> on him.

When he is about to <S%H4390>fill<s%> his <S%H990>belly,<s%> God shall <S%H7971>cast<s%> the <S%H2740>fury<s%> of his <S%H639>wrath<s%> on him, and shall <S%H4305>rain<s%> it on him while he is <S%H3894>eating.<s%>
He shall <S%H1272>flee<s%> from the <S%H1270>iron<s%> <S%H5402>weapon,<s%> and the <S%H7198>bow<s%> of <S%H5154>steel<s%> shall <S%H2498>strike<s%> him through.

It is <S%H8025>drawn,<s%> and <S%H3318>comes<s%> out of the <S%H1465>body;<s%> yes, the <S%H1300>glittering<s%> <S%H1300>sword<s%> <S%H1980>comes<s%> out of his <S%H4846>gall:<s%> <S%H367>terrors<s%> are on him.

<S%H3605>All<s%> <S%H2822>darkness<s%> shall be <S%H2244>hid<s%> in his <S%H6845>secret<s%> places: a <S%H784>fire<s%> not <S%H5301>blown<s%> shall <S%H398>consume<s%> him; it shall <S%H3381>go<s%> <S%H3415>ill<s%> with him that is <S%H8300>left<s%> in his <S%H168>tabernacle.<s%>
The <S%H8064>heaven<s%> shall <S%H1540>reveal<s%> his <S%H5771>iniquity;<s%> and the <S%H776>earth<s%> shall <S%H6965>rise<s%> up against him.
The <S%H2981>increase<s%> of his <S%H1004>house<s%> shall <S%H1540>depart,<s%> and his goods shall <S%H5064>flow<s%> away in the <S%H3117>day<s%> of his <S%H639>wrath.<s%>
<S%H2088>This<s%> is the <S%H2506>portion<s%> of a <S%H7563>wicked<s%> <S%H120>man<s%> from <S%H430>God,<s%> and the <S%H5159>heritage<s%> <S%H561>appointed<s%> to him by <S%H410>God.<s%>
